mapper.insert: insert into post values(null, #{ title }, #{ contents }, now(), #{ categoryNo });
mapper.select: select p.no, p.title, p.contents, category_no, date_format(p.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate from post p, category c where c.no = ${ categoryNo } and p.category_no = c.no order by p.reg_date desc limit ${ postIndex - 1 }, 1;
